column4: off topic question: I have 2 computers what is the best way to get the highest transfer speeds between the 2 computers? crossover, usb? something else?
I figure cat 5e crossover should peak out the nics?
lol, never thought of that, ones a laptop and I dont have the cable
ok crossover cool I build one quick thanks
most newer NICs can auto sense the lnk type and do not require a crossover gable
